name: Quest For Plantlandia!
description:
Made for Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam! 

Play as 1 of 3 flower-based heroes exploring the dungeons of Plantlandia! 

Heavily-inspired by isometric games and Pokemon, this is a mash-up of the genres. Battle your way through hordes of plant and gardening tool type creatures.

Fortunately, death is only a minor setback with the time travel tool! Go back to any previously explored tile on the floor. But beware, it resets the state of your character too! 

Level up your character and try to make it to floor 7!
